items.sentence: I went to Boston with one of Tom\'s friends.
Tom finally got the courage to ask Mary out.
Tom finished doing his homework an hour ago.
Tom forgot to do what he was supposed to do.
I just said I didn\'t want to talk about it.
I\'m going to stick around and wait for Tom.
The teacher treated all the students fairly.
I couldn\'t have asked for a better teacher.
We couldn\'t find a place to park near here.
We don\'t have to pay all these bills today.
Tom doesn\'t know whether to do that or not.
Who do you think will take over the company?
I\'ve just been told never to do that again.
I\'ll tell Tom you\'re not going to do that.
I wish you\'d just tell me what\'s going on.
How did you know that Tom wanted to do that?
Tom showed up at Mary\'s house unexpectedly.
Have you made plans for dinner this evening?
Didn\'t you know I used to be a taxi driver?
The hypnotist made Tom cluck like a chicken.
Tom told Mary that he had been out shopping.
Tom told me he had the information I wanted.
Tom is a reputable and a trustworthy person.
Is everything all right between you and Tom?
Is it true that Tom plans to move to Boston?
There aren\'t many people in the park today.
Tom and Mary still haven\'t heard from John.
We\'re just waiting for something to happen.
We\'re planning on taking pictures tomorrow.
We\'re supposed to be helping Tom right now.
We\'re trying to figuring out our next move.
We\'ve already been told about what Tom did.
Tom was in prison for more than three years.
Who do you speaks French better, you or Tom?
Tom gave Mary the ring he\'d bought for her.
I have to learn how to order food in French.
I can\'t tell you how happy I am to be here.
Tom should know the answer to that question.
You\'re the only person who can help me now.
You\'re very lucky to have a home like this.
Don\'t you understand why this is a problem?
Most houses around here don\'t have cellars.
Tom and Mary are in the next room with John.
Why aren\'t you doing what I told you to do?
I didn\'t want to go and Tom didn\'t either.
I\'ve already decided what I\'m going to do.
Tom had no money and couldn\'t buy any food.
Tom\'s face lights up whenever he sees Mary.
Tom\'s funeral will be held on October 20th.
I took three years of French in high school.
